name: L1/L2 Support Engineer
description:
Nauchsoft is looking for a Technical Support (1-2 level) to provide technical support to our customers via phone, web, email, chat and other support channels as required.

Responsibilities:

  • answer calls;
  • respond daily to customer inquiries in a timely manner;
  • Mac troubleshooting issues;
  • provide customers with timely resolution of technical issues;
  • establish remote sessions to assist customers with the troubleshooting;
  • maintaining of clients systems;
  • answering questions from customers about the features and capabilities of the system;
  • preparing description documentation for new features;
  • creating of knowledge database.

Requirements:

  • fluent English and Spanish\Portuguese – Intermediate+ (B2) level and higher is required;
  • 0.5+ year experience in Support;
  • good communication skills, experience in business correspondence;
  • proactive position, strong sense of empathy with customers using our products is required.

OPTIONAL

  • Experience with GSuite, Okta, Slack;
  • Mac troubleshooting experience.

We offer:

  • Opportunity for professional self-realization and growth;
  • Remote work;
  • Medical insurance;
  • Friendly team, you may consult with colleagues and get help;
  • Competitive salary;
  • 25-days of paid vacation;
  • 100%-paid sick leave;
  • Foreign language courses and other corporate programs;
  • Bonuses in case of wedding or a child’s birth.
